captions.text: -Good morning.

This morning we are going to
film an authentic Daddy 'Do.

We've had so many moms writing
in asking for hairstyles

simple enough that their
husbands can do them.

I'm sure it's just an
easy way to get women

a little more time
in the morning.

So this morning, we're going
to have my husband actually
do the hairdo.

So I'm going to
take over filming.
-OK.

So this is called
triple-flipped ponytail,

and my wife says it's great
for dads because it's fast

and it's easy, but
it looks like you

did a fishtail braid, which
is really hard for guys to do,
trust me.

And so the first thing
we're going to do

is pull the band
away from the head,

because we're going
to flip the ponytail.
Is that about right?
I think that's about right.
OK.

And then we have a
topsy tail, which

you can buy from
the internet on eBay

or there's a link
on my wife's website

where you can buy
it from Amazon.

So we're going to
take the topsy tail,

and we're going
to slide it right

down through the loosened part
of the ponytail, right here.

And then I'm going to stick
my fingers through the hole

and grab the ponytail
and pull it through.

Now I'm going to pull the
bottom of the topsy tail

so that the ponytail
actually flips into itself.
Here.
She's got thick hair.
There we go.
It's coming.

You don't want to pull too
hard, because it could actually
hurt your daughter's hair.

And women do this much
more gently than men do.
OK.

See it's a little bit loose,
so the quickest way to tighten

a ponytail is just
to cinch it up

a little bit by dividing it
in half and cinching it up.
Now I need to wet it down.

And comb it a little
bit straighter
so we can do another flip.
We want it to look all uniform.
OK.

Can you hand me another
hair band, sweetie?

Go about halfway
down, and we're going

to just add the
rubber band in there.
Whoa, I just undid it.
OK, let's try that again.
It's OK.
I'm a dad, right?
I just did it again.
OK.

I obviously don't know
how to put in a band.
OK.
I'm going to do it twice.
There we go.
I got it that time.
Do it again.

Just three times
is probably enough.
Are you laughing at your dad?
OK.
I'm going to do the same thing.
Where's the topsy tail?
Right here.

Stick it down
through the middle,

and I'm going to pull
the ponytail through it,

and it's just going to come
right down through the ponytail
again.
All right.

Let's just pull it through
there a little bit more.
OK.
Do the same thing.
Wet it down for one last flip.
Straighten the hair out.

Can you hand me your
last hair band, sweetie?

Let's see if I can do
this right this time.
Flip it one last time.

Come through the middle, grab
the ponytail, pull it through.
All right.
There you have it.
The triple-flip ponytail.

Let me just wrap
this up a little bit,

so it doesn't just look
like it was left dangling.
Little bit of hair spray.
There you go.

Triple-flip ponytail,
and it looks

like it was braided
so you're going

to win brownie points
with all the women.
There you go.

title: Triple-Flipped Ponytail | Daddy 'Do Hairstyles | Cute Girls Hairstyles

comments.text:
It's very simple to do this with out the ponytail looping thing. You just 
out your hair in a pony or on the side and put a hairband in. Then, you 
separate 2 pieces above the band and pull your ponytail through the loop. 
No need to waste your money ﻿

comments.text:
It's very simple and you can do it with your hands. You do a ponytail and
